QueryViewSpec.Name: Our Custom Queries In ParentPaths Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Finds where our custom queries are used.
QueryViewSpec.Author: Mark Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: -- this is to get the ParentView queries: WITH XMLNAMESPACES ( 'bb_appfx_queryview' AS x) , cteQueryDefXml as ( SELECT ID, DISPLAYNAME, OBJECTNAME, [DESCRIPTION], QUERYVIEWSPEC.value('(/x:QueryViewSpec/@RecordType)[1]','nvarchar(max)') as RecordType, p.value('./@ParentView', 'nvarchar(max)') as ParentView, p.value('./@PathAlias', 'nvarchar(max)') as ParentPathAlias --r.value('./@RelatedView', 'nvarchar(max)') as RelatedView, --r.value('./@PathAlias', 'nvarchar(max)') as RelatedPathAlias FROM dbo.QUERYVIEWCATALOG --dbo.adhocquery cross apply QUERYVIEWSPEC.nodes('/x:QueryViewSpec/x:RelationshipOperations/x:AddToParentView') as x(p) --cross apply QUERYVIEWSPEC.nodes('/x:QueryViewSpec/x:RelationshipOperations/x:AddRelatedView') as s(r) where OBJECTNAME like '%USR%' ) select distinct (case when a.NAME is null then DISPLAYNAME else a.NAME end) as QueryName, OBJECTNAME, RecordType, ParentPathAlias, ParentView from cteQueryDefXml left join dbo.ADHOCQUERY a on a.QUERYVIEWCATALOGID = cteQueryDefXml.ID left join dbo.QUERYCATEGORYCODE c on c.ID = a.QUERYCATEGORYCODEID;
